participant_1.background:
I have started to make plans for my retirement, including where I want to live and what I want to do with my time.
I have a standing bike in my house, and I use it several times a day.
my favorite music is country.
I treasure my collection of vintage horror movies, which I love to watch with my grandchildren.
I don't care about fashion as much as I care about my family.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about my extensive book collection, which is filled with all the classics and some hidden gems.
I like to play video games to de-stress after a long day of welding.
I work hard to help support my family, even if I'm not always the most graceful.
I spent my days listening to vinyl records and cooking healthy meals for myself.
i live in a small apartment in new york.

content.text: Hello! How are you today?
Hey there! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about yourself?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm just spending some time relaxing and reading.
That sounds nice! I'm currently working on a welding project in my garage.
Oh, cool! What are you making?
I'm making a new shelf for my collection of vintage horror movies.
That's awesome! I love horror movies. Do you have any favorites?
I do! I love The Shining, The Exorcist, and Alien.
Those are all great movies! I love The Exorcist too.
Me too! It's one of the scariest movies ever made.
Yeah, it definitely is. I'm not sure I could watch it again, though.
Haha, yeah, it's definitely not for everyone.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, cook healthy meals, and listen to vinyl records.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to play video games too.
What are some of your favorite games?
I like a lot of different games, but some of my favorites are The Legend of Zelda, Mario Kart, and Pokemon.
Those are all great games! I love The Legend of Zelda too.
Me too! It's my favorite video game series of all time.
It's definitely one of the best.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a welder. I work in a small shop in New York City.
Oh, cool! I've always thought welding was a really interesting job.
It can be! It's definitely not for everyone, but it's a lot of fun.
I'm sure it is! So, what do you like about your job?
I like the challenge of it. It's always something new, and I get to use my hands to create things.
That sounds really rewarding.
It is! I love being able to see my work come to life.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
